name: Darwin's Quest: A Bad Owen
description:
Welcome in the Darwin Universe ! 

Discover the rivalry between two evolutionary scientist : Richard Owen & Charles Darwin.

A Game Jam Tours 2018 project.

The aim was to create a game around the Evolution theme.

PS : Try to find the easter egg and speed run the game in less than 5 seconds !!

Command list : Space to shoot, Arrow key to move :)
